description: Source code for the HomeScreen widget in a Flutter application, implementing role-based UI elements, navigation, and layout for a healthy meal ordering platform.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Root widget for the home page, managing role selection and main layout.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: Stateful logic for HomeScreen, including role selection, navigation, and layout building.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: Reused widget for displaying list items with icons and labels.

classes.name: _ResponsiveDrawerHeader
classes.description: Widget displaying user's role in the navigation drawer header.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Builds the header section with role title and role selector pills.

methods.name: _roleGridOrColumn
methods.description: Constructs the role-specific UI sections, responsive layout with grid or column.

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Creates a dropdown for user to change roles.

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Builds role selection pills with visual active state.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Returns header title string based on current role.

methods.name: _adminOrders
methods.description: UI section for Admin's Orders Management.

methods.name: _managerLocations
methods.description: UI for managing locations and time slots.

methods.name: _deliveryAssigned
methods.description: UI for delivery agent's assigned deliveries.
